# web-button

## Properties

| Property       | Attribute        | Description                                        | Type                                  | Default     |
| -------------- | ---------------- | -------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `ariaLabelBtn` | `aria-label-btn` | (optional) aria-label for <button> element         | `string`                              | `undefined` |
| `category`     | `category`       | (optional) Category for <button> custom element    | `"plain" \| "primary" \| "secondary"` | `'primary'` |
| `color`        | `color`          | (optional) Color attribute for <button> element    | `"CTA" \| "critical"`                 | `undefined` |
| `disabled`     | `disabled`       | (optional) Disabled attribute for <button> element | `boolean`                             | `undefined` |
| `label`        | `label`          | Button label                                       | `string`                              | `undefined` |
| `name`         | `name`           | (optional) Name attribute for <button> element     | `string`                              | `undefined` |
| `size`         | `size`           | (optional) Size for <button> custom element        | `"large" \| "small"`                  | `'large'`   |
| `type`         | `type`           | (optional) Types for <button> element              | `"button" \| "reset" \| "submit"`     | `undefined` |
| `value`        | `value`          | (optional)  Value for <button> element             | `string`                              | `undefined` |
